definitions.body: oppression, distress's;—´[[ל]] abs. 1Ki 22:27, 1Ki 22:27 + 5 t.; cstr. 2Ki 13:4 + 2 t.; sf. [[לַחֲחֵ֫נוּ]]De 26:4, Ps 44:25; —oppression of Isr. Ex 3:9 (E; + vb. cogn.), 2Ki 13:4 cf. De 26:7 (‖[[עֳנִי]], [[עָמָל]]) Ps 44:25 (‖[[עֳנִי]]); oppr. of (i.e. by) an enemy, Ps 42:10, Ps 43:2; in gen. Job 36:15 (‖[[עֳנִי ]]; ´[[וּמַיִם ל]] ´[[לֶחֶם ל]] 1Ki 22:27 = 2Ch 18:26 bread of oppression and water of oppression, i.e. prison-fare (> Klo scanty fare); cf. ´[[לֶחֶם חַר וּמַיִם ל]] Is 30:20, appar. of privations of a siege (cf. Che Di Du; on the apposition in these passages v. Ges:§131. 2 (b) Kö:iii, § 333 p.q. Da:Synt. § 29. e).
